title: On the road again...
body:
I get to go out and visit developers again. As a part of the Tech Days program I'll be in
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia March 6-8, 2007
London, United Kingdom March 13-15, 2007
Paris, France March 19-21, 2007
If you're in the neighbourhood of any of these, come join in. There's a huge pile of cool stuff to see.
